h3_39: University of Florida College of Medicine
span_48: University of Florida College of Medicine
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Over the four years of training in our department, residents are exposed to diverse pathology that comes from UF being a Level 1 trauma center, having an active organ transplantation program, and hosting a cancer center that treats common and uncommon malignancies. Residents are encouraged to present at tumor boards and other multidisciplinary settings
